description.value:
You touch upon the freedom of flight to reach your enemies no matter where they could be, and conjure ethereal wings to chase them. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Fly} up to your speed or your fly speed if it is higher. You gain a status bonus equal to 5 times your amount of Zeal to your speed for this movement.

At the end of your movement, you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike}. After the Strike, if you are in the air, you glide safely downwards up to a distance equal to your total speed for this action by taking a move action during your turn or automatically at the end of your turn. If you can fly, you can choose to stay airborne.
